title: White Box vs Black Box Amazon PPC Tools | Saddle AdPulse
meta_description: Why most PPC tools are black boxes that hide their logic, and why AdPulse is different.

sections.headline: Amazon Ads runs on black boxes. AdPulse is the white box.
sections.subtitle: Ask your current tool: "Which optimizations actually worked?" If they can't answer with data, you're paying for a black box. AdPulse is the White Box Engine—the only one that proves every decision. We validate every bid change, separate "Market Luck" from "Decision Impact," and show exactly what's working with counterfactual analysis.

sections.headline: The Accountability Gap
sections.intro: Every PPC tool changes your bids. But when you ask "did it work?"—they can't tell you.

rows.blackbox: Not measured (Can't separate luck from skill)

sections.headline: What No Other Tool Can Tell You
sections.footnote: We analyzed 12 leading tools. None measure decision impact.

problems.title: Black Box Problem #1
problems.stat: They take credit for market trends
problems.explanation: Sales went up 15%? Great! But the whole account went up 12%. Your "optimization" only added 3%. They don't tell you that.

problems.title: Black Box Problem #2
problems.explanation: Amazon's attribution window is slow. Measuring at 7 days means you're making decisions on incomplete data. We measure at 14/30/60 days.

problems.title: Black Box Problem #3
problems.stat: No way to know what didn't work
problems.explanation: If you don't know which changes hurt performance, you'll keep making the same mistakes. AdPulse shows you both wins and losses.
